```{r}
#| label: 

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

titanic_cat <- function(...) {
  ggplot2::labs(
    x = "",
    y = "",
    title = "Titanic Travelers by Class",
    caption = 'Source: Encylopedia Titanica (2023)',
    ...
  )
}

titanic_data <- read_csv("titanic.csv")
ggplot(titanic_data, aes(y=class)) +
  geom_bar(fill=NA, color = "black") +
  titanic_cat()

```
